primary_diagnosis.justification: The patient's history confirms recurrent episodes of depression, supported by the Clinical Entity Agent's assessment (ruling out mania/hypomania). The severity is designated as **moderate** based on the necessity of initiating treatment (*Sertraline*) approximately 4 weeks ago, indicating current, impactful functional impairment.
dsm_criteria_met: Meets criteria for a Major Depressive Episode (current)
History of at least one previous Major Depressive Episode (Recurrent)
Never had a manic or hypomanic episode (Unipolar)

ruled_out.reason: Explicitly ruled out by the patient's denial of any history of manic or hypomanic episodes, confirming a unipolar course.

ruled_out.description: Major depressive disorder, single episode, moderate
ruled_out.reason: Ruled out because the patient's history confirms a recurrent illness pattern, necessitating the use of the F33.x code set.
